text: Lievegem is a municipality in the Belgian province of East Flanders. It was created on 1 January 2019 when the municipalities of Lovendegem, Waarschoot and Zomergem joined together to become the new municipality of Lievegem. The new municipality has an area of and more than 25,000 people. Category:2019 establishments in Belgium Category:Municipalities of East Flanders
title: Lievegem
